ProductInfo.Features:
18.0-megapixel CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Imaging Processor; ISO 100-6400 (expandable to 12800)
Includes 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS UD standard zoom lens
Improved EOS HD Video mode with manual exposure control; Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor
5.3 fps continuous shooting; enhanced iFCL 63-zone, Dual-layer metering system
Compatibility with SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards (32GB Card included)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D Digital SLR Camera Kit with Canon EF-S 18-135mm and 70-300mm IS USM Lenses + 32GB Master Kit - Includes: + Large Camera and Lens Case + Extra High Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery + 50-inch Tripod + 58mm and 67mm UV Filters + Transcend 32 GB Class 10 SDHC Memory Card + Card Reader + Memory Card Case + Shutter Release + Camera Cleaning Kit
